concept.title: Can you explain some of the error messages?

p.b: What to do when I get technical error message, or nothing shows up in UI where it should?

ul.li: Open the Error Log view (Ctrl-3 "Error Log" or menu Window > Show View") - any recent red entries in there should be sent to Temenos support. Best to clear old Error, retry your action - send anything new that appears, by exporting them.
Also check the *.log file next to your DesignStudio.EXE (in the installation directory) and send it along.
Also always clarify which exact DS build version you're using (menu Help > About), and to exactly which release of T24 are you connecting. (You may "just" have a version mismatch.)

conbody.p: The following error messages can be found in Design Studio.

stentry.codeph: Unable to transform the document: XXX

strow.stentry: The file XXX could not be parsed. It could be an invalid character in a Java statement, like Â¦.

stentry.codeph: Resource is out of sync with the file system

strow.stentry: Select the root of the project, and press F5 .

stentry.codeph: Linked dataset XXX results in cyclic reference with YYY domain

strow.stentry: Cyclic reference between Classes in different domain is not allowed. But Cyclic reference between Dataset in different domain is allowed. To remove this error, you must move the datasets to the same domain model.
